sentences.english: Urban management law enforcement violence, people violent resistance to law phenomenon affecting social harmony.

sentences.english: The damaged shack was taken away by a chengguan truck, Zhang said.
sentences.chinese: 被破坏的板房当时由城管的卡车运走。

sentences.english: The battlement took care of the big party big captain high Hong to represent each segment to say the sentence big truth.

sentences.english: In some cases, the chengguan are themselves the target of violence and retribution.

sentences.english: Xindu, an urban district of Chengdu, has chosen major image surgery.

sentences.english: The only sanctions they have are fines and confiscations.
